SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user (account, `password`, `name`, create_time) values (#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, account, `password`, `name`, create_time from t_user
